title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: A new 38-villa Autograph Collection resort just opened in the Maldives — and you can book from 112K points
items.description: Marriott Bonvoy has a new 38-villa Autograph Collection resort in the Maldives. This resort just opened, and you can book it from 112,000 points per n...

items.title: The 10 best restaurants to use your new Amex Platinum Resy credit
items.description: With thousands of acclaimed restaurants on Resy, we’ve rounded up the best spots to make your quarterly Amex Platinum Resy credit count.

items.title: Crunching the numbers: Is it more expensive to book flights through a credit card travel portal?
items.description: Flight fares vary among credit card travel portals, and may be more expensive than booking directly. We gathered data points to see which option is be...

items.title: A cruisetour vs. a cruise-only sailing in Alaska — which is best for you?
items.description: We'll help you decide whether to take a traditional Alaskan cruise or consider a cruisetour — a combined sea-and-land vacation.

items.title: Spirit Airlines cuts 5 cities, increasing bankruptcy exits to 18 destinations
items.description: Spirit Airlines will end service to Phoenix and St. Louis as it cuts five more cities from its route map.
